Articles.Content:
Hello, this is the latest product from Horizon Aircraft Corp.

i moved it from our original page (check it out!) to here because it's going to take up a lot of space.

(some assembly required)

(does not include rockets)

The Starter pack:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

TarsierSpaceTech and karbonite expansion pack:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

B9 Expansion pack (not compleated)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download link(choose what parts you want from the folder):https://copy.com/GE1qZB6SlYA4eaDU

Want something that's not here? ask for it below!

Edited December 3, 2014 by natonator200
Nice man i like the reactor. I might finally get into the new b9 parts. I haven't found them very useful there hugggggggggge.
you should get it, its a great mod pack! it comes with tons of new engines and a lot of wings and fuselages.

i tried docking a big SSTO to it .

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Awesome, I'm going to try it out. thanks!
could you add some parts for Kethane plz!

i don't have kethane right now (i have used it before though), I'm using kerbodyne because it has more engines. however here's a suggestion:

take a basic section, then take the docking port of the top and put a kethane sensor there, or put symmetry on 2 then put a radial attachment port on the side and then attach a kethane sensor. up to you. the first option will be harder to dock, but the second option will be hard to aim the sensor.
Ok thx. i'll give it a try.

[NOTICE]

Horizon just got an employe that wants to design rockets to launch these parts. if they work they will be added

ETA:Unknown
